channel.title: Macos on Maksym Prokopov personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Macos on Maksym Prokopov personal blog

item.title: Install Ruby 3.1.4 on macOS
item.description: In case ruby can’t find OpenSSL 3 headers, use this way. brew install ruby-install ruby-install ruby 3.1.4 -- --with-openssl-dir=$(brew --prefix openssl)

item.title: Applescript instantly open Zoom link from the iCal calendar
item.description: This is really my little timesaver because you know, a lot of meetings happen when you work remotely.
